title: Disappearance Day of Sri Murari Gupta | HH Stoka Krishna Swami | ISKCON Bangalore Sanga
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.key_quote: Today is the disappearance day anniversary of Shri Murari Gupta, who was an intimate associate of Shri Chaitanya Mahaprabhu.
segments.summary: Introduction to the lecture on the disappearance day of Shri Murari Gupta.

segments.key_quote: Murari Gupta was a storehouse of love of Godhead.
segments.summary: Description of Murari Gupta's devotional qualities, humility, and his profession as a physician who used his earnings to maintain his family.

segments.key_quote: With his earnings, as Murari Gupta treated his patients, by his mercy, both their bodily and spiritual diseases subsided.
segments.summary: Stories of Murari Gupta healing Lord Chaitanya and acting as Garuda during ecstatic pastimes.

segments.key_quote: Although Murari heard these divine glories of Krishna from the Lord himself, his heart remained steadfastly fixed on his eternal master Lord Ramachandra.
segments.summary: The story of Lord Chaitanya testing Murari Gupta's devotion to Lord Rama and recognizing him as an incarnation of Hanuman.

segments.key_quote: Recognizing him as an incarnation of Hanuman, the eternal servant of Rama, Mahaprabhu accepted Murari Gupta as his very life and soul moved by his humility and unalloyed devotion.
segments.summary: Lord Chaitanya's acceptance of Murari Gupta and his desire to leave his body before the Lord's disappearance.
